author: View All Posts Adekunle
title: Video: 'Let the President communicate with Nigerians ...' - Vanguard News
text:
Home » News » Video: ‘Let the President communicate with Nigerians …’ Video: ‘Let the President communicate with Nigerians …’ On 8:18 am In News , Videos by adekunle Comments 
Many Nigerians in this video bear their mind on the health status of President Muhammadu Buhari who is in London on medical vacation. 
As any prayed that God heal and gives him more strength to lead the country others want the President to speak to the citizens so as to assure the people of his state saying ‘let the president communicate with Nigerian’ adekunle
